column3: SECTION D: FUELS AND STOVES USED FOR COOKING
column5:
Is cooking usually done in the house, in a separate building, or outdoors?

(If in main house, probe to determine if cooking is done in a separate room. 
If outdoors, probe to determine if cooking is done on veranda, covered porch, or open air.)
